DOC.brief_title: Correlation In-lab Pleural Fluid Glucose Measurements With Finger Stick Glucometer Portable Point Care Testing Device ( i-STAT ) .
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective study identify patient VAMC diagnosis pleural effusion undergo diagnostic thoracentesis.The investigator plan analyze two bedside point-of-care fluid glucose test method ( I- STAT device finger stick glucometer ) measure pleural fluid glucose level . The result obtain two method compare traditionally lab measure pleural fluid glucose level .
